title: Is there distributed fuzz testing platform against modern proprietary CPU like SETI@HOME? [closed]
content:
My idea is near what SETI Institute does.

Distributed fuzz testing against modern Intel and Amd Central processing units(CPU).

To find similar to Blue Pill bugs.

Is there?

comments.text: I don't think you're going to find anything in a CPU like those ones using fuzzing. But, good luck!
